text: I had a really nice day today, feeling happy and content
The weather is beautiful today, I'm going for a walk
I'm so excited for the weekend, planning a trip!
Just feeling a bit down and out, work was tough
Feeling overwhelmed and stressed out by everything on my plate
I'm so tired of everything lately
I feel so lonely and isolated from everyone
Nothing seems to make me happy anymore, I feel empty
I've been crying a lot and I don't know why
I'm so tired of fighting this feeling, everything is pointless
I just want all of this pain to end for good
I can't take it anymore, I'm thinking about disappearing
It feels like the only way out is to just end it all
I have a plan to hurt myself and I don't know if I can stop
I've decided to end my life and have written a note
